open_drawdown_case.description: open drawdown case a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only open drawdown case a drawdown case A if it is not the case that the drawdown for A is open and it is not the case that drawdown for A is completed and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I open drawdown case a drawdown case A, it is the case that the drawdown for A is open

select_request_channel.description: select request channel a drawdown case A a request channel B
preconditions: I can only select request channel a drawdown case A a request channel B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open
I can only select request channel a drawdown case A a request channel B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I select request channel a drawdown case A a request channel B, it is the case that A has channel B selected

select_facility_document.description: select a facility document B for a drawdown case A when drawdown is open and not locked and frozen
preconditions: I can only select a facility document B for a drawdown case A when drawdown is open and not locked and frozen if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open

I can only select a facility document B for a drawdown case A when drawdown is open and not locked and frozen if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I select a facility document B for a drawdown case A when drawdown is open and not locked and frozen, it is the case that B is the facility selected for A

verify_borrowing_base_certificate.description: verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown case A with a drawdown document B
preconditions: I can only verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown case A with a drawdown document B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A requires document B and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is borrowing the base certificate
I can only verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown case A with a drawdown document B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown case A with a drawdown document B, it is the case that B is verified and the borrowing base for A is verified

verify_compliance_certificate.description: verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A requires document B and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a compliance certificate
I can only verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that B is verified and the compliance certificate for A is verified

verify_covenant_compliance_statement.description: verify covenant compliance statement for a drawdown case A with a document B
preconditions: I can only verify covenant compliance statement for a drawdown case A with a document B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A requires document B and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a covenant compliance statement
I can only verify covenant compliance statement for a drawdown case A with a document B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify covenant compliance statement for a drawdown case A with a document B, it is the case that B is verified and the covenant statement for A is verified

verify_use_of_proceeds_statement.description: verify an use of proceeds statement B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify an use of proceeds statement B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A requires document B and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a use of proceeds statement
I can only verify an use of proceeds statement B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify an use of proceeds statement B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that B is verified and the use of proceeds for A is verified

verify_fee_calculation_sheet.description: verify a fee calculation sheet B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify a fee calculation sheet B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A requires document B and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a fee calculation sheet
I can only verify a fee calculation sheet B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify a fee calculation sheet B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that B is verified

record_two_officer_signoff.description: record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D
preconditions: I can only record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a document for case A and B is a fee calculation sheet and B is verified and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and C has full clearance and D has full clearance

I can only record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that C is equal to D
effects: Once I record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D, it is the case that a two officer signoff has been recorded for A

verify_person_authorization_record.description: verify an authorization kyc record C for a participant person B on a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify an authorization kyc record C for a participant person B on a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A requires document C and C is a document for B and C has been received and C is an authorization kyc record
I can only verify an authorization kyc record C for a participant person B on a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that C is verified
effects: Once I verify an authorization kyc record C for a participant person B on a drawdown case A, it is the case that C is verified and B has their authentication documents verified

verify_person_contact_details.description: verify contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B has their authentication documents verified and B is in the required set
I can only verify contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B's contact is verified
effects: Once I verify contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A, it is the case that B's contact is verified

run_full_person_screening.description: run full person screening a drawdown case A a participant person B
preconditions: I can only run full person screening a drawdown case A a participant person B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is linked to the case A and B has their authentication documents verified and B's contact is verified
I can only run full person screening a drawdown case A a participant person B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B has full clearance
effects: Once I run full person screening a drawdown case A a participant person B, it is the case that B's sanctions have been checked and B has been pep checked and B has full clearance

run_sanctions_screening_only.description: run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B
preconditions: I can only run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is linked to the case A and B has their authentication documents verified
I can only run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B's sanctions have been checked
effects: Once I run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B, it is the case that B's sanctions have been checked

run_pep_screening_only.description: run pep screening only for a drawdown case A and a participant person B
preconditions: I can only run pep screening only for a drawdown case A and a participant person B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is linked to the case A and B has their authentication documents verified
I can only run pep screening only for a drawdown case A and a participant person B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B has been pep checked
effects: Once I run pep screening only for a drawdown case A and a participant person B, it is the case that B has been pep checked

complete_basic_drawdown_checks.description: complete basic drawdown checks for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only complete basic drawdown checks for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the borrowing base for A is verified
I can only complete basic drawdown checks for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that basic drawdown checks are complete for A
effects: Once I complete basic drawdown checks for a drawdown case A, it is the case that availability for A has been calculated and A is confirmed to have limited headroom and basic drawdown checks are complete for A

enable_fast_track.description: enable fast track a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only enable fast track a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the borrowing base for A is verified
I can only enable fast track a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that fast track is enabled for A
effects: Once I enable fast track a drawdown case A, it is the case that fast track is enabled for A

compile_drawdown_package.description: compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J
preconditions: I can only compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the borrowing base for A is verified and the covenant statement for A is verified and the compliance certificate for A is verified and the use of proceeds for A is verified and F is a document for case A and F is borrowing the base certificate and F is verified and G is a document for case A and G is a covenant compliance statement and G is verified and H is a document for case A and H is a compliance certificate and H is verified and I is a document for case A and I is a use of proceeds statement and I is verified and J is a document for case A and J is a fee calculation sheet and J is verified and B is the required person for A and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and E is the required person for A and B has full clearance and C has full clearance and D has full clearance and E has full clearance and basic drawdown checks are complete for A

I can only compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that the drawdown package for A is compiled and it is not the case that B is equal to C and it is not the case that D is equal to E
effects: Once I compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J, it is the case that the drawdown package for A is compiled

approve_drawdown_package_four_eyes.description: approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E
preconditions: I can only approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the drawdown package for A is compiled and a two officer signoff has been recorded for A and B is the required person for A and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and E is the required person for A and B has full clearance and C has full clearance and D has full clearance and E has full clearance

I can only approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A is approved by credit ops and it is not the case that B is equal to C and it is not the case that D is equal to E
effects: Once I approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E, it is the case that A is approved by credit ops and A is approved for risk

approve_drawdown_package_fast_track.description: approve drawdown package fast track a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only approve drawdown package fast track a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and fast track is enabled for A and the borrowing base for A is verified and the covenant statement for A is verified
I can only approve drawdown package fast track a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A is approved by credit ops
effects: Once I approve drawdown package fast track a drawdown case A, it is the case that A is approved by credit ops and A is auto approved

authorize_packet_creation.description: authorize packet creation for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only authorize packet creation for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A is approved by credit ops

I can only authorize packet creation for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A has a compliance hold flag and it is not the case that A has a suspicious payment flag and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown and it is not the case that packet creation is authorized for A
effects: Once I authorize packet creation for a drawdown case A, it is the case that packet creation is authorized for A

raise_compliance_hold.description: raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open
I can only raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A has a compliance hold flag
effects: Once I raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A, it is the case that A has a compliance hold flag

validate_facility_document.description: validate a facility document B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only validate a facility document B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is eligible for case A and packet creation is authorized for A
I can only validate a facility document B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is a validated facility document
effects: Once I validate a facility document B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that B is a validated facility document

create_drawdown_packet.description: create drawdown packet a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a signature slot C and a signature slot D
preconditions: I can only create drawdown packet a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a signature slot C and a signature slot D if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and packet creation is authorized for A

I can only create drawdown packet a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a signature slot C and a signature slot D if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is created and it is not the case that C is equal to D
effects: Once I create drawdown packet a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a signature slot C and a signature slot D, it is the case that B is created and B is a packet for the case A and B has a signature slot C and B has a signature slot D

attach_facility_document_to_packet.description: attach facility document to packet a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C
preconditions: I can only attach facility document to packet a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for the case A and B is created and C is a validated facility document

I can only attach facility document to packet a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is finalized and it is not the case that B has attached facility document C
effects: Once I attach facility document to packet a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C, it is the case that B has attached facility document C

assign_signer_to_packet_slot.description: assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D
preconditions: I can only assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for the case A and B is created and C is the required person for A and C has their authentication documents verified and C's contact is verified and B has a signature slot D

I can only assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B is assigned to signer C
effects: Once I assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D, it is the case that B is assigned to signer C
Once I assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D, it is not the case anymore that B has a signature slot D

start_signature_collection.description: start signature collection for a drawdown packet A
preconditions: I can only start signature collection for a drawdown packet A if it is the case that A is created
I can only start signature collection for a drawdown packet A if it is not the case that A is finalized and it is not the case that signature collection for A has started
effects: Once I start signature collection for a drawdown packet A, it is the case that signature collection for A has started

capture_signer_signature.description: capture signature for a drawdown packet A from a borrower signatory B
preconditions: I can only capture signature for a drawdown packet A from a borrower signatory B if it is the case that signature collection for A has started and A is assigned to signer B
I can only capture signature for a drawdown packet A from a borrower signatory B if it is not the case that B's signature is captured on A
effects: Once I capture signature for a drawdown packet A from a borrower signatory B, it is the case that B's signature is captured on A

verify_two_distinct_signatures.description: verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C
preconditions: I can only verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C if it is the case that A is assigned to signer B and A is assigned to signer C and B's signature is captured on A and C's signature is captured on A

I can only verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C if it is not the case that two signatures on A are verified and it is not the case that B is equal to C
effects: Once I verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C, it is the case that two signatures on A are verified

perform_packet_compliance_check.description: perform packet compliance check on a drawdown packet A
preconditions: I can only perform packet compliance check on a drawdown packet A if it is the case that two signatures on A are verified
I can only perform packet compliance check on a drawdown packet A if it is not the case that A has been checked for compliance
effects: Once I perform packet compliance check on a drawdown packet A, it is the case that A has been checked for compliance

finalize_drawdown_packet.description: finalize drawdown packet a drawdown packet A
preconditions: I can only finalize drawdown packet a drawdown packet A if it is the case that A has been checked for compliance
I can only finalize drawdown packet a drawdown packet A if it is not the case that A is finalized
effects: Once I finalize drawdown packet a drawdown packet A, it is the case that A is finalized
Once I finalize drawdown packet a drawdown packet A, it is not the case anymore that signature collection for A has started

confirm_packet_has_three_facility_docs.description: confirm packet has three facility docs a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C a facility document D a facility document E
preconditions: I can only confirm packet has three facility docs a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C a facility document D a facility document E if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for the case A and B is finalized and B has attached facility document C and B has attached facility document D and B has attached facility document E

I can only confirm packet has three facility docs a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C a facility document D a facility document E if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that the drawdown packet for A is complete and it is not the case that C is equal to D and it is not the case that C is equal to E and it is not the case that D is equal to E
effects: Once I confirm packet has three facility docs a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a facility document C a facility document D a facility document E, it is the case that the drawdown packet for A is complete

reopen_packet_and_reset_signatures.description: reopen a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token C and reset a signature slot D and a signature slot E
preconditions: I can only reopen a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token C and reset a signature slot D and a signature slot E if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for the case A and B is created and C is available

I can only reopen a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token C and reset a signature slot D and a signature slot E if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that B has been reopened
effects: Once I reopen a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token C and reset a signature slot D and a signature slot E, it is the case that B has been reopened and the token C is consumed and B has a signature slot D and B has a signature slot E

Once I reopen a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token C and reset a signature slot D and a signature slot E, it is not the case anymore that C is available and it is not the case anymore that B is finalized and it is not the case anymore that B has been checked for compliance and it is not the case anymore that two signatures on B are verified and it is not the case anymore that signature collection for B has started

lock_case_for_execution.description: lock a drawdown case A for execution using a drawdown packet B
preconditions: I can only lock a drawdown case A for execution using a drawdown packet B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the drawdown packet for A is complete and B is a packet for the case A and B is finalized and packet creation is authorized for A
I can only lock a drawdown case A for execution using a drawdown packet B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I lock a drawdown case A for execution using a drawdown packet B, it is the case that A is locked for drawdown
Once I lock a drawdown case A for execution using a drawdown packet B, it is not the case anymore that the drawdown for A is open

reopen_locked_case.description: reopen drawdown for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B
preconditions: I can only reopen drawdown for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and B is available
I can only reopen drawdown for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B if it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I reopen drawdown for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B, it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A has a compliance hold flag and the token B is consumed
Once I reopen drawdown for a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B, it is not the case anymore that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case anymore that B is available

freeze_case_due_to_suspicious_payment.description: freeze a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B
preconditions: I can only freeze a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open

I can only freeze a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B if it is not the case that A is locked for drawdown and it is not the case that packet creation is authorized for A and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I freeze a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B, it is the case that A has payment instruction B and A has a suspicious payment flag and A is frozen for drawdown

draft_payment_instruction.description: draft payment instruction a payment instruction B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only draft payment instruction a payment instruction B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and packet creation is authorized for A and the drawdown packet for A is complete

I can only draft payment instruction a payment instruction B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that a payment instruction has been drafted for A and it is not the case that A has payment instruction B
effects: Once I draft payment instruction a payment instruction B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that a payment instruction has been drafted for A and A has payment instruction B and B payment instruction was created and the payment instruction for A is validated

validate_payment_instruction.description: validate payment instruction for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only validate payment instruction for a drawdown case A if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and the payment instruction for A is validated
I can only validate payment instruction for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A payment instruction is approved
effects: Once I validate payment instruction for a drawdown case A, it is the case that A payment instruction is approved

approve_payment_instruction.description: approve payment instruction for a case A
preconditions: I can only approve payment instruction for a case A if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and A payment instruction is approved
I can only approve payment instruction for a case A if it is not the case that payment instruction for A is ready to sign
effects: Once I approve payment instruction for a case A, it is the case that payment instruction for A is ready to sign

sign_payment_instruction.description: sign payment instruction a payment instruction A a drawdown case B
preconditions: I can only sign payment instruction a payment instruction A a drawdown case B if it is the case that B is locked for drawdown and A payment instruction was created and payment instruction for B is ready to sign
I can only sign payment instruction a payment instruction A a drawdown case B if it is not the case that A is a signed payment instruction
effects: Once I sign payment instruction a payment instruction A a drawdown case B, it is the case that A is a signed payment instruction

send_instruction_to_treasury.description: send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury
preconditions: I can only send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury if it is the case that A is a signed payment instruction
I can only send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury if it is not the case that A is a payment instruction sent to the treasury
effects: Once I send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury, it is the case that A is a payment instruction sent to the treasury

execute_treasury_release.description: execute treasury release a payment instruction A a drawdown case B a drawdown packet C a facility document D
preconditions: I can only execute treasury release a payment instruction A a drawdown case B a drawdown packet C a facility document D if it is the case that B is locked for drawdown and packet creation is authorized for B and B is approved for risk and A is a payment instruction sent to the treasury and C is a packet for the case B and C is finalized and C has attached facility document D and D is eligible for case B and D requires an fx review and the covenant statement for B is verified and the use of proceeds for B is verified
I can only execute treasury release a payment instruction A a drawdown case B a drawdown packet C a facility document D if it is not the case that payment instruction A has been executed
effects: Once I execute treasury release a payment instruction A a drawdown case B a drawdown packet C a facility document D, it is the case that payment instruction A has been executed

reserve_wire_cutoff_window.description: reserve wire cutoff window for a payment instruction A using a wire cutoff window token B
preconditions: I can only reserve wire cutoff window for a payment instruction A using a wire cutoff window token B if it is the case that payment instruction A has been executed and B is available
I can only reserve wire cutoff window for a payment instruction A using a wire cutoff window token B if it is not the case that A is reserved for the wire cutoff
effects: Once I reserve wire cutoff window for a payment instruction A using a wire cutoff window token B, it is the case that A is reserved for the wire cutoff and the token B is consumed
Once I reserve wire cutoff window for a payment instruction A using a wire cutoff window token B, it is not the case anymore that B is available

consume_cutoff_window_without_reservatio.description: consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and B is available
I can only consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown
effects: Once I consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that the token B is consumed
Once I consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A, it is not the case anymore that B is available

release_wire_payment.description: release wire payment for a payment instruction A
preconditions: I can only release wire payment for a payment instruction A if it is the case that A is reserved for the wire cutoff
I can only release wire payment for a payment instruction A if it is not the case that the beneficiary is credited for A and it is not the case that the wire for A has been released
effects: Once I release wire payment for a payment instruction A, it is the case that the wire for A has been released

confirm_beneficiary_credit.description: confirm beneficiary credit for a payment instruction A
preconditions: I can only confirm beneficiary credit for a payment instruction A if it is the case that the wire for A has been released
I can only confirm beneficiary credit for a payment instruction A if it is not the case that the beneficiary is credited for A
effects: Once I confirm beneficiary credit for a payment instruction A, it is the case that the beneficiary is credited for A

mark_funds_settled.description: mark funds settled for a payment instruction A
preconditions: I can only mark funds settled for a payment instruction A if it is the case that the beneficiary is credited for A
I can only mark funds settled for a payment instruction A if it is not the case that funds for A are settled
effects: Once I mark funds settled for a payment instruction A, it is the case that funds for A are settled

create_disbursement_notice.description: create a disbursement notice B for a case A addressed to a borrower signatory C using a notice dispatch window token D from a drawdown packet E with a facility document F
preconditions: I can only create a disbursement notice B for a case A addressed to a borrower signatory C using a notice dispatch window token D from a drawdown packet E with a facility document F if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and D is available and E is a packet for the case A and E is finalized and E has attached facility document F and F is eligible for case A and the facility F requires agent notice and C is the required person for A and C has full clearance

I can only create a disbursement notice B for a case A addressed to a borrower signatory C using a notice dispatch window token D from a drawdown packet E with a facility document F if it is not the case that B is a notice addressed to signer C in case A
effects: Once I create a disbursement notice B for a case A addressed to a borrower signatory C using a notice dispatch window token D from a drawdown packet E with a facility document F, it is the case that B is a notice addressed to signer C in case A and B has been created and the token D is consumed

Once I create a disbursement notice B for a case A addressed to a borrower signatory C using a notice dispatch window token D from a drawdown packet E with a facility document F, it is not the case anymore that D is available

preconditions: I can only approve a disbursement notice A if it is the case that A has been created
I can only approve a disbursement notice A if it is not the case that A has been approved
effects: Once I approve a disbursement notice A, it is the case that A has been approved

create_notice_delivery_package.description: create delivery package a delivery package A for a disbursement notice B
preconditions: I can only create delivery package a delivery package A for a disbursement notice B if it is the case that B has been created and B has been approved
I can only create delivery package a delivery package A for a disbursement notice B if it is not the case that the delivery package A has been created
effects: Once I create delivery package a delivery package A for a disbursement notice B, it is the case that the delivery package A has been created and A is a package for B

apply_delivery_label.description: apply delivery label to a delivery package A using a delivery slot token B
preconditions: I can only apply delivery label to a delivery package A using a delivery slot token B if it is the case that the delivery package A has been created and B is available
I can only apply delivery label to a delivery package A using a delivery slot token B if it is not the case that A is a labeled package
effects: Once I apply delivery label to a delivery package A using a delivery slot token B, it is the case that A is a labeled package and the token B is consumed
Once I apply delivery label to a delivery package A using a delivery slot token B, it is not the case anymore that B is available

assign_senior_override_review.description: assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B
preconditions: I can only assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and B is available
I can only assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B if it is not the case that A has a senior override assigned
effects: Once I assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B, it is the case that A has a senior override assigned and the token B is consumed
Once I assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B, it is not the case anymore that B is available

print_delivery_label.description: print delivery label for a labeled delivery package A
preconditions: I can only print delivery label for a labeled delivery package A if it is the case that A is a labeled package
I can only print delivery label for a labeled delivery package A if it is not the case that A has a printed label
effects: Once I print delivery label for a labeled delivery package A, it is the case that A has a printed label

scan_delivery_label.description: scan delivery label a delivery package A
preconditions: I can only scan delivery label a delivery package A if it is the case that A has a printed label
I can only scan delivery label a delivery package A if it is not the case that the label of A has been scanned
effects: Once I scan delivery label a delivery package A, it is the case that the label of A has been scanned

mark_notice_ready.description: mark a disbursement notice A ready to be sent
preconditions: I can only mark a disbursement notice A ready to be sent if it is the case that A is ready to be sent
effects: Once I mark a disbursement notice A ready to be sent, it is the case that A is ready to be sent

send_notice_via_secure_delivery.description: send a disbursement notice A via secure delivery package a delivery package D for a drawdown case C with a payment instruction B to a borrower signatory E
preconditions: I can only send a disbursement notice A via secure delivery package a delivery package D for a drawdown case C with a payment instruction B to a borrower signatory E if it is the case that C is locked for drawdown and A is a notice addressed to signer E in case C and A has been created and C has payment instruction B and B payment instruction was created and D is a package for A and the label of D has been scanned and A is ready to be sent

I can only send a disbursement notice A via secure delivery package a delivery package D for a drawdown case C with a payment instruction B to a borrower signatory E if it is not the case that C is frozen for drawdown and it is not the case that A has been sent
effects: Once I send a disbursement notice A via secure delivery package a delivery package D for a drawdown case C with a payment instruction B to a borrower signatory E, it is the case that A has been sent

complete_final_controls.description: complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G
preconditions: I can only complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and packet creation is authorized for A and A is approved for risk and the drawdown package for A is compiled and a two officer signoff has been recorded for A and B is the required person for A and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and E is the required person for A and B has full clearance and C has full clearance and D has full clearance and E has full clearance and funds for F are settled and G has been sent

I can only complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G if it is not the case that B is equal to C and it is not the case that D is equal to E and it is not the case that A has a compliance hold flag and it is not the case that A has a suspicious payment flag and it is not the case that A is frozen for drawdown and it is not the case that final controls are complete for A
effects: Once I complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G, it is the case that final controls are complete for A

close_drawdown_case.description: close drawdown case a drawdown case A with a payment instruction B and a disbursement notice C
preconditions: I can only close drawdown case a drawdown case A with a payment instruction B and a disbursement notice C if it is the case that A is locked for drawdown and final controls are complete for A and B payment instruction was created and payment instruction B has been executed and the beneficiary is credited for B and C has been sent
I can only close drawdown case a drawdown case A with a payment instruction B and a disbursement notice C if it is not the case that drawdown for A is completed
effects: Once I close drawdown case a drawdown case A with a payment instruction B and a disbursement notice C, it is the case that drawdown for A is completed
Once I close drawdown case a drawdown case A with a payment instruction B and a disbursement notice C, it is not the case anymore that A is locked for drawdown

action_nl_templates.select_facility_document: select facility document {?facility_doc} for drawdown case {?case} when drawdown is open and not locked and frozen
action_nl_templates.verify_borrowing_base_certificate: verify borrowing base certificate for drawdown case {?case} with drawdown document {?borrowing_base_doc}
action_nl_templates.verify_compliance_certificate: verify compliance certificate compliance certificate {?compliance_cert_doc} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_covenant_compliance_statement: verify covenant compliance statement for drawdown-case {?case} with document {?covenant_statement_doc}
action_nl_templates.verify_person_authorization_record: verify authorization kyc record {?auth_kyc_doc} for participant person {?person} on drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_person_contact_details: verify contact details for participant person {?person} in drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.run_pep_screening_only: run pep screening only for drawdown case {?case} and participant person {?person}
action_nl_templates.complete_basic_drawdown_checks: complete basic drawdown checks for drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates.raise_compliance_hold: raise compliance hold on drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.validate_facility_document: validate facility document {?facility_doc} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.create_drawdown_packet: create drawdown packet drawdown packet {?packet} for drawdown case {?case} with signature slot {?signature_slot_1} and signature slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates.capture_signer_signature: capture signature for drawdown_packet {?packet} from borrower_signatory {?borrower_signer}
action_nl_templates.perform_packet_compliance_check: perform packet compliance check on drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates.confirm_packet_has_three_facility_docs: confirm packet has three facility docs {?case} {?packet} {?facility_doc_1} {?facility_doc_2} {?facility_doc_3}
action_nl_templates.reopen_packet_and_reset_signatures: reopen drawdown packet {?packet} for drawdown case {?case} with reopen key token {?reopen_token} and reset signature slot {?signature_slot_1} and signature slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates.lock_case_for_execution: lock drawdown-case {?case} for execution using drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates.reopen_locked_case: reopen drawdown for drawdown-case {?case} with reopen-key-token {?reopen_token}
action_nl_templates.freeze_case_due_to_suspicious_payment: freeze drawdown case {?case} due to suspicious payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates.draft_payment_instruction: draft payment instruction payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.send_instruction_to_treasury: send signed payment instruction {?payment_instruction} to the treasury
action_nl_templates.reserve_wire_cutoff_window: reserve wire cutoff window for payment instruction {?payment_instruction} using wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token}
action_nl_templates.consume_cutoff_window_without_reservatio: consume wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.confirm_beneficiary_credit: confirm beneficiary credit for payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates.create_disbursement_notice: create disbursement notice {?notice} for case {?case} addressed to borrower signatory {?borrower_signer} using notice dispatch window token {?dispatch_window_token} from drawdown packet {?packet} with facility document {?facility_doc}
action_nl_templates.create_notice_delivery_package: create delivery package delivery package {?delivery_package} for disbursement notice {?notice}
action_nl_templates.apply_delivery_label: apply delivery label to delivery package {?delivery_package} using delivery slot token {?delivery_slot_token}
action_nl_templates.assign_senior_override_review: assign senior override review to drawdown_case {?case} using delivery_slot_token {?delivery_slot_token}
action_nl_templates.print_delivery_label: print delivery label for labeled delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates.mark_notice_ready: mark disbursement notice {?notice} ready to be sent
action_nl_templates.send_notice_via_secure_delivery: send disbursement notice {?notice} via secure delivery package delivery package {?delivery_package} for drawdown case {?case} with payment instruction {?payment_instruction} to borrower signatory {?borrower_signer}
action_nl_templates.close_drawdown_case: close drawdown case drawdown_case {?case} with payment_instruction {?payment_instruction} and disbursement_notice {?notice}

predicate_nl_templates.wire_released: the wire for {?payment_instruction} has been released
predicate_nl_templates.doc_is_use_of_proceeds_statement: {?doc} is a use of proceeds statement
predicate_nl_templates.borrowing_base_verified: the borrowing base for {?case} is verified
predicate_nl_templates.compliance_certificate_verified: the compliance certificate for {?case} is verified
predicate_nl_templates.covenant_statement_verified: the covenant statement for {?case} is verified
predicate_nl_templates.use_of_proceeds_verified: the use of proceeds for {?case} is verified
predicate_nl_templates.two_officer_signoff_recorded: a two officer signoff has been recorded for {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.limit_headroom_confirmed: {?case} is confirmed to have limited headroom
predicate_nl_templates.basic_drawdown_checks_complete: basic drawdown checks are complete for {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.drawdown_package_compiled: the drawdown package for {?case} is compiled
predicate_nl_templates.packet_for_case: {?packet} is a packet for the case {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.drawdown_packet_complete: the drawdown packet for {?case} is complete
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_drafted: a payment instruction has been drafted for {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_validated: the payment instruction for {?case} is validated
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_ready_to_sign: payment instruction for {?case} is ready to sign
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_sent_to_treasury: {?payment_instruction} is a payment instruction sent to the treasury
predicate_nl_templates.wire_cutoff_reserved: {?payment_instruction} is reserved for the wire cutoff
predicate_nl_templates.notice_addressed_to_signer: {?notice} is a notice addressed to signer {?borrower_signer} in case {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.delivery_package_created: the delivery package {?delivery_package} has been created
predicate_nl_templates.label_scanned: the label of {?delivery_package} has been scanned

action_nl_templates_indef.open_drawdown_case: open drawdown case a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.select_request_channel: select request channel a drawdown case {?case} a request channel {?channel}
action_nl_templates_indef.select_facility_document: select a facility document {?facility_doc} for a drawdown case {?case} when drawdown is open and not locked and frozen
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_borrowing_base_certificate: verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown case {?case} with a drawdown document {?borrowing_base_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_compliance_certificate: verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate {?compliance_cert_doc} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_covenant_compliance_statement: verify covenant compliance statement for a drawdown-case {?case} with a document {?covenant_statement_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_use_of_proceeds_statement: verify an use-of-proceeds-statement {?use_of_proceeds_doc} for a drawdown-case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_fee_calculation_sheet: verify a fee_calculation_sheet {?fee_calc_doc} for a drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.record_two_officer_signoff: record two officer signoff a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown document {?fee_calc_doc} a bank drawdown officer {?officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?officer_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_person_authorization_record: verify an authorization kyc record {?auth_kyc_doc} for a participant person {?person} on a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_person_contact_details: verify contact details for a participant person {?person} in a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.run_full_person_screening: run full person screening a drawdown case {?case} a participant person {?person}
action_nl_templates_indef.run_sanctions_screening_only: run sanctions screening only a drawdown case {?case} a participant person {?person}
action_nl_templates_indef.run_pep_screening_only: run pep screening only for a drawdown case {?case} and a participant person {?person}
action_nl_templates_indef.complete_basic_drawdown_checks: complete basic drawdown checks for a drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.enable_fast_track: enable fast track a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.compile_drawdown_package: compile drawdown package a drawdown case {?case} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_2} a drawdown document {?borrowing_base_doc} a drawdown document {?covenant_statement_doc} a drawdown document {?compliance_cert_doc} a drawdown document {?use_of_proceeds_doc} a drawdown document {?fee_calc_doc}

action_nl_templates_indef.raise_compliance_hold: raise compliance hold on a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.validate_facility_document: validate a facility document {?facility_doc} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.create_drawdown_packet: create drawdown packet a drawdown packet {?packet} for a drawdown case {?case} with a signature slot {?signature_slot_1} and a signature slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.attach_facility_document_to_packet: attach facility document to packet a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown packet {?packet} a facility document {?facility_doc}

action_nl_templates_indef.start_signature_collection: start signature collection for a drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.capture_signer_signature: capture signature for a drawdown_packet {?packet} from a borrower_signatory {?borrower_signer}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_two_distinct_signatures: verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet {?packet} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.perform_packet_compliance_check: perform packet compliance check on a drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.finalize_drawdown_packet: finalize drawdown packet a drawdown packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.confirm_packet_has_three_facility_docs: confirm packet has three facility docs a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown packet {?packet} a facility document {?facility_doc_1} a facility document {?facility_doc_2} a facility document {?facility_doc_3}
action_nl_templates_indef.reopen_packet_and_reset_signatures: reopen a drawdown packet {?packet} for a drawdown case {?case} with a reopen key token {?reopen_token} and reset a signature slot {?signature_slot_1} and a signature slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.lock_case_for_execution: lock a drawdown-case {?case} for execution using a drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.reopen_locked_case: reopen drawdown for a drawdown-case {?case} with a reopen-key-token {?reopen_token}
action_nl_templates_indef.freeze_case_due_to_suspicious_payment: freeze a drawdown case {?case} due to suspicious a payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates_indef.draft_payment_instruction: draft payment instruction a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.validate_payment_instruction: validate payment instruction for a drawdown-case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.approve_payment_instruction: approve payment instruction for a case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.sign_payment_instruction: sign payment instruction a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.send_instruction_to_treasury: send a signed payment instruction {?payment_instruction} to the treasury
action_nl_templates_indef.execute_treasury_release: execute treasury release a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown packet {?packet} a facility document {?facility_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.reserve_wire_cutoff_window: reserve wire cutoff window for a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} using a wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token}
action_nl_templates_indef.consume_cutoff_window_without_reservatio: consume a wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token} for a drawdown case {?case}

action_nl_templates_indef.print_delivery_label: print delivery label for a labeled delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates_indef.scan_delivery_label: scan delivery label a delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates_indef.mark_notice_ready: mark a disbursement notice {?notice} ready to be sent
action_nl_templates_indef.send_notice_via_secure_delivery: send a disbursement notice {?notice} via secure delivery package a delivery package {?delivery_package} for a drawdown case {?case} with a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} to a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer}
action_nl_templates_indef.complete_final_controls: complete final controls a drawdown case {?case} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_2} a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} a disbursement notice {?notice}
action_nl_templates_indef.close_drawdown_case: close drawdown case a drawdown_case {?case} with a payment_instruction {?payment_instruction} and a disbursement_notice {?notice}

type_hierarchy: Everything that is a entity is also a object

Everything that is a drawdown case or a participant person or a drawdown document or a facility document or a drawdown packet or a payment instruction or a disbursement notice or a delivery package or a request channel or a signature slot or a resource token is also a entity
Everything that is a corporate drawdown case is also a drawdown case
Everything that is a borrower signatory or a bank drawdown officer is also a participant person
Everything that is a delivery slot token or a reopen key token or a wire cutoff window token or a notice dispatch window token is also a resource token
